I am co-director and professor of the Fashion Communication Master's program at the University of Barcelona. I have trained at the Ecole du Louvre (Paris), the Institut Fran√ßais de la Mode (Paris), and the Elisava School of Design in Barcelona. Currently, I work as an independent consultant in communication and creative strategy, building internal teams and guiding brands in how they shape their narrative and cultural impact.

I am particularly interested in the role of culture within a brand, from internal communication to brand cultural initiatives, which led me to coordinate and teach the Brand Culture postgraduate program at Elisava.
